key_risks: Securities Law Violations: Class action lawsuit for alleged violations of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
High Customer Concentration: Revenue heavily dependent on a limited number of large clients.
Talent Retention Challenges: Competitive global market for skilled IT professionals.
Economic Sensitivity: Performance tied to volatile client spending on IT services.
Geopolitical Risks: Operations in politically and economically unstable regions.
controversies: Class action lawsuit for alleged securities law violations.
social_issues: Talent retention challenges in a competitive global market.
governance_issues: Securities law violations and the associated class action lawsuit.

sources.title: Endava plc Securities Class Action Filed by Levi & Korsinsky
sources.snippet: Levi & Korsinsky Files Securities Class Action Against Endava plc (DAVA). Levi & Korsinsky has announced a securities class action lawsuit on behalf of shareholders of Endava plc (DAVA). This action seeks to recover losses incurred by shareholders due to alleged securities fraud occurring between May 23, 2023, and February 28, 2024.
